sense.name: design as an engineer
sense.examples: He engineered the water supply system. They engineered the bridge on theory, not on calculations that can be done on computer models.

sense.name: plan and direct (a complex undertaking)
sense.examples: He engineered the robbery. She was the operating head of a portfolio company, where she engineered a merger with Planning Technologies. She engineered more than one lasting romance with her dinner parties.
